item.title: Making my Way to Linux
item.description: Well, not even a day had passed when I finally decided to dual boot Windows and Linux. And so, I grabbed a USB of mine and started up Rufus. I did all of the installation thinamajig, and before I knew it, I was finally running POP!_OS. This is my first time not using a virtual machine and installing a different operating system on a bare-bones machine, let alone dual booting two of them in one drive.
